item0.name: Broken Stopwatch
item0.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item1.name: Berserker's Greaves
item1.description:
35% Attack Speed
45 Move Speed

item2.name: Nashor's Tooth
item2.description:
100 Ability Power
50% Attack Speed
  • Icathian Bite: Attacks apply (15 + 20% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit.

item3.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item3.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item5.name: Dark Seal
item5.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Hail of Blades
perk0.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item0.name: Doran's Ring
item0.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

perk0.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item2.name: Galeforce

60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.
